trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the text command to run against the data source.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the wait time before terminating the attempt to execute a command and generating an error.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx x xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The time in seconds to wait for the command to execute.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The transaction within which a Command object of a .NET Framework data provider executes.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxx x Xxxxxxx xxxxxx xx x .XXX Xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The default value is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xx x xxxx xxxxxxxxx $$xxxxxx$Xxxxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx Xxxxxx Xxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the command object should be visible in a customized interface control.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx x xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

\ntrue, if the command object should be visible in a control; otherwise false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$$ xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.

trans-unit.source:
The default is true.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxxx xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x
